page.title: 08KENNET YOUTH CLUB, THATCHAM.
page.content: In this area the only youth club is at the Kennet Secondary school. It costs 25p to attend, is held on Monday and Wednesday nights with about 90 children attending each night with more in the winter. Each member is expected to join in an activity like badminton or cookery. There will be a disco on June 5th, a staff versus members rounders match on June 12th, and a Mr and Miss Kennet youth club contest on June 19th. On 26th, a sponsored Treasure Hunt will be held to raise money for guide dogs. Ice skating on July 3rd, swimming at Newbury July 10th and an end of term disco. More clubs are needed in this area especially for 10 and 11 year olds. The school is to have an indoor swimming pool but we feel Thatcham needs a swimming pool of its own.
